description.p: The corpus must be sentence-split, tokenized and tokens must be POS-tagged.
The root is represented as a tuple like dependencies but without a head argument, and labelled root.

param-doc.name: language
param-doc.p: Language of the text to parse. currently supports english (default), french, german, spanish and chinese.

param-doc.name: formFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature containing the token surface form.

param-doc.name: posTagFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature containing the token POS tag.

param-doc.name: sentenceFilter
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated on each sentence annotation, the sentence is parsed if this expression evaluates as true.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: tokenLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing token annotations.

param-doc.name: omitRoot
param-doc.p: If set, do not create the root tuple.
